column4: I just plugged in my headphones and was listing to music. well I went to watch a youtube video, and the sound was 2000% louder than the music and nearly destroyed my eardrums. this is exactly why linux will never ever be on the standard everyday desktop; because it's more concerned with looking 'leet' than actually functioning
sorry, but how does that help? at all?
it's an audio issue and that's where you adjust audio levels. lol
